mapper.select: SELECT rv.review_id , rv.user_fk , u.account_name , u.user_photo_path , rv.restaurant_fk, rst.restaurant_name, rst.restaurant_photo_path, rv.review_star , rv.review_sentence , rv.review_like_count , rv.review_comment_count, rv.review_posted_time , (CASE WHEN lc.like_comment_id is null THEN false ELSE true END) AS is_my_like, rv.deleted AS deleted FROM (SELECT * from reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 50) AS rv LEFT JOIN ( (SELECT like_comment_id FROM like_comments WHERE user_logical_id = #{userLogicalId} AND is_like = true ) AS lc LEFT JOIN links_to_review AS lrv ON lc.like_comment_id = lrv.like_comment_fk ) ON rv.review_id = lrv.review_fk LEFT JOIN users AS u ON rv.user_fk = u.user_id LEFT JOIN restaurants AS rst ON rv.restaurant_fk = rst.restaurant_id
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET review_like_count = review_like_count + 1 WHERE review_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_id = #{id} AND deleted = false ) AS t JOIN users AS u ON t.user_fk = u.user_id LEFT JOIN links_to_review AS lt ON t.review_id = lt.review_fk LEFT JOIN like_comments AS lc ON lt.like_comment_fk = lc.like_comment_id WHERE lc.comment_deleted = false
